title: What Every Woman Should Know
description: What was God thinking when he made man and woman? Take a journey with me and we'll get to the heart of the matter, which will take us all the way back to Adam and Eve. The first volume in the two-volume book just may set you free.Unpack some of the most controversial passages in the Bible before embarking on a journey through history to see the changing role of women over the ages. The discoveries may astound you.
author: Jori Aguilar Sams
